120.description: In the fast paced world, everything needs to be continuous. Although testing plays an important role in product development to control software quality, how does the automation involved in the software development cycle in terms of costs and creating value? How do we keep up with the changes?
120.title: Mobile Automation Test

121.description: Have you ever given a thought on how to modernize 15 years old software systems? How about if they are written in 2 different countries by engineers from different tech backgrounds and in fact formerly being competitors? Do you think it is quick and easy to move from a data center to a modern cloud infrastructure? I’d talk about challenges and complexity to transform mature systems with millions of users to be supported around the clock. Join the session to find out what worked and what didn't.
121.title: A Journey to Modernize Our Software Systems

122.title: Live like a human in the machine's world
122.description:
Technology dominated our lives.
And the most fashionable buzzwords can be mesmerizing.
AI, Machine Learning, Big Data, Blockchain. You name it.
But we too often forgot that the real intent behind all these bright inventions is to solve genuine human problems.
Digital strategist Julia Tsoi will take you through her journey of human-centric advocacy from Hong Kong to Naples, Italy. Stories of her quest to find humanity in this crazy technology world from IBM to Apple Developer Academy. And how Design Thinking continues to guide her through business consulting challenges at EY Wavespace.

123.title: Android 10 and the Advances in Video Codecs
123.description:
Android 10 introduced support for the open source video codec AV1. According to Google, this allows media providers to stream high quality video content to Android devices using less bandwidth. But what are codecs? Why do we need new ones and how video streaming companies use them?
This talk goes beyond Android MediaPlayer into what happens behind the scenes. We'll explore the nature of video codecs, streaming, and a peek into how Stadia, Google's game streaming platform plays with codec strategies to achieve high fidelity graphics in low latency.

130.description: Sorry for the click-bait title. But seriously, come and learn how a modern RPC framework can improve the workflow and communication of your team(s).
130.title: Getting Away with Not Writing Documentation by using gRPC

140.title: Creating Variational Auto-encoders in Tensorflow
140.description: The talk will go through the motivation & possible applications of using Variational Auto-encoders (VAEs), and how to create them under Tensorflow 2.0 using Keras and Tensorflow Probability.
